DataElement.preferredName: Procedure Domain Radiation Therapy End Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The last date that radiation therapy was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Procedure Domain Radiation Therapy End Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure._Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._The calendar date on which something is to terminate or did terminate.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
